features.name: POWERS 5 INDICATORS OF BRAIN PERFORMANCE
features.desc: The ingredients of Neuriva support 5 different indicators of brain performance: focus, memory, learning, accuracy and concentration

features.name: CLINICALLY PROVEN NATURAL INGREDIENTS
features.desc: Clinical studies have shown that coffee cherry (neurofactor) and plant-sourced PS (phosphatidylserine) enhance brain performance

features.name: NEUROFACTOR, A POWERFUL EXTRACT
features.desc: Neurofactor is an extract of whole fruit of the Coffea Arabica plant and has been shown to increase levels of BDNF. BDNF is short for brain-derived neurotrophic factor. This protein (which is found in the brain) BDNF has been widely studied and is known to support the survival of existing neurons and encourage the growth of new neurons

medicine_description: Neuriva Brain Performance is a rather new supplement to hit the market. Despite a rather thin ingredient list, the product has seen a lot of buzz from its customers. Many are wondering if Neuriva will live up to their claims. Neuriva is offered by Schiff Vitamins and can be found both online and in stores around the nation. Neuriva brain performance supplement
product_details: Based on what’s been uncovered so far, there are some clear pros and cons to giving Neuriva a try. Schiff does offer a full refund within 30 days if the product is in saleable condition, but opened products will serve a 15% restocking fee. The customer is also responsible for return shipping.

allRatings.name: AK
allRatings.reviewMessage: The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new “heathered” color and the price is always excellent through shop

allRatings.name: Mamun
allRatings.reviewMessage: Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware
